toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field defined by the formula_extid field. Neither the formula_extid, nor the externalid field itself, is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: External Id
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__externalid__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field used to define the external ID of a record, which is also an internal system field. Neither is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Formula External Id
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__formula_extid__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icitemlot__c.rstk__formula_extid__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>rstk__icitemlot_item__r.rstk__externalid__c & '_' & rstk__icitemlot_lotno__c/*This formula should NOT be changed as the code assumes this formula and it would break if this is changed - see ObjectKeys.getIcitemlotExternalId()*/</formula> <inlineHelpText>This is an internal system field used to define the external ID of a record, which is also an internal system field. Neither is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Formula External Id</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Internal formula for constructing the associated name field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Name Formula
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__formula_name__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icitemlot__c.rstk__formula_name__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>LEFT(rstk__icitemlot_item__r.Name , 49) + '_' + rstk__icitemlot_lotno__c</formula> <inlineHelpText>Internal formula for constructing the associated name field.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Name Formula</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field used to define the searchindex of a record, which is also an internal system field. Neither is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Formula Search Index
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__formula_searchindex__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icitemlot__c.rstk__formula_searchindex__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>rstk__icitemlot_div__r.rstk__sydiv_div__c + ' ' + rstk__icitemlot_item__r.rstk__icitem_item__r.rstk__peitem_item__c</formula> <inlineHelpText>This is an internal system field used to define the searchindex of a record, which is also an internal system field. Neither is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Formula Search Index</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: User-defined Comments regarding this Lot, up to 25 characters in length.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lot Comments
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_comments__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the date that the Item Lot record is added to the system.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Date Lot Added
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_datelotadded__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Days until expiration issue date or expiration date, if issue lead time is not used.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Days Until Expiration Issue Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_daysuntilexpired__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icitemlot__c.rstk__icitemlot_daysuntilexpired__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>IF(rstk__icitemlot_issexpiredate__c != null, rstk__icitemlot_issexpiredate__c - TODAY(), rstk__icitemlot_expiredate__c - Today())</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <inlineHelpText>Days until expiration issue date or expiration date, if issue lead time is not used.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Days Until Expiration Issue Date</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>18</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Number</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field defines the Expiration Date for this Lot Number record. When adding record manually, if left blank, date will be set to TODAY + the Shelf Life defined for the given item.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Expiration Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_expiredate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field indicates that there is a non-zero inventory balance for this Item-Lot
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Inventory Balance is Not Zero
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_haveqty__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The height of this item within this particular Lot.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Height
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_height__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The date this Lot expires, using the Expiration Date less the Lot Issue Expiration Lead Time. Not applicable when no Expiration Date is not set.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Issue Expiration Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_issexpiredate__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Item Number
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_item__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__icitemlot__c.rstk__icitemlot_item__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Inventory Item Number</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Item Number</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__icitem__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>Inventory By Lot Number</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>icitemlots</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The length of this item within this particular Lot.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Length
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_length__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: User-defined description up to 100 characters in length
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Description
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_lotdesc__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: User-defined reference value up to 50 characters in length
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Reference
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_lotref__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, Lot is blocked from being issued. The item/lot won't display on pick lists, as related Inventory by Locations will be flagged as 'Available for picking Ind' = Unchecked (false). Checking the 'On Hold' value will enable the Lot to be picked.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: On Hold
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_onhold__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When a new Lot record is added, this field is set to the Inventory Shelf life.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Original Shelf Life
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_origshelflife__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Any transaction (for this Division, Item, Project) that affects a Stock Location Type of 'C' (Consigned) will update this field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Qty Consigned
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_qtycons__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Any transaction (for this Division, Item, Project) that affects a Stock Location Type of 'O' (On Hand) will update this field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Quantity On Hand
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_qtyoh__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Any transaction (for this Division, Item, Project) that affects a Stock Location Type of 'N' (Non-Nettable) will update this field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Qty Non-Nettable
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_qtyohnn__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Any transaction (for this Division, Item, Project) that affects a Stock Location Type of 'V' (Vendor Managed) will update this field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Qty Vendor Managed
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_qtyvmi__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Enter the Unique Device Identifier to be associated with this lot, if applicable.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unique Device Identifier
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__icitemlot_udi__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field not currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Search Index
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__searchindex__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field which is not currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Trigger Options
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__triggeroptions__c
